item.title: Editor for short instruction videos - Upwork
item.description:
Create short (30-90 sec) videos from raw input videos. Recordings are made from 2 cameras.

* We will voice over the videos and put our own background music in, original background sound must be mute.

* Align the background straight: the table line should be horizontally straight (except when this causes the rest of the video to appear really crooked. If this happens, please try to find a balance).

* Whenever a part of the face above the chin is visible, switch to camera 2 or crop the video.

* If the sides of the backdrop appear in the videos of camera 1 (anything that is not black), please crop the video.

*Elevate the video material by adjusting the colors: the white tablecloth bright (but not overexposed), the black backdrop dark, the other colors vibrant. Do keep it within normal proportions and the video material of both cameras should be somewhat the same.

* Videos should be between 20 seconds to 90 seconds depending on how long the activity.

* Repetitive or long shots of one action can be sped up or cut down to the result of that action (please choose what is best).

* We will upload our scripts for the voice overs. They are in Dutch, but if you’re confused about how a video should be edited, you can translate them and use them as a guide.

* Please insert the intro at the beginning of the video.
* Please insert the outro at the end of the video.
* Select a cover photo for each video. The ratio aspects should be: 1600 x 1040px

The raw videos are being made right now, this will be an ongoing activity for month while we are creating all the content for our platform.

Looking for a fixed price per video first, initial batch needs 100 videos to be created.
